raw_comment:
What do you notice?
NBA has the most players and coaches of color. 
What do you wonder?
I wonder why there aren't nearly as many coaches of color. 
What impact does this have on you and your community?
It impacts my community because of the lack of diversity within coach jobs in professional sports leagues. 
What's going on in this graph? Write a catchy headline that captures the graph's main idea.
How diverse are American sports really?
ace_sentences: The NBA has the most players of color.
The NBA has the most coaches of color.
I wonder why there are not nearly as many coaches of color.
The reason is a lack of diversity in coach jobs in professional sports leagues.
The headline is: How diverse are American sports really?
